ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: What game features would you like to see adde	d?
ygData.msgSnippet: A game feature I d like to see is customer service *grin*  but since EQ is all about making the game fair and equal as possible (nerfing items and so on) I d
ygData.messageBody:
A game feature I'd like to see is customer service *grin*  but since EQ is all about making the game fair and equal as possible (nerfing items and so on) I'd like to see some equality in the races..I mean the evil races get the 2 biggest and baddest races in the game while the good races get the smartest..why not make them all equal?  Another thing I'd think would be cool is a feature that relates to the armor dyes..molding, and tailoring any piece of gear you own to your own liking.   Like say if you were a ogre warrior and you didn't like the way your helmet looked like, well you could go down to a forge or blacksmith and pay a certain amount to have them mold the helmet anyway you would like..maybe you would like horns on the helmet or a certain design ecthed on it..and for casters you could go to a tailor somewhere and have them design your robe a certain way..maybe you would like longer sleeves or a slit in your robe or a fancy collar. 
 
Dabruiser Troll
Warrior of the 29th season
